definition: bowed stringed instrument that is the highest member of the violin family, try to fix or mend
details:
noun
- bowed stringed instrument that is the highest member of the violin family
= synonyms: violin
verb
- try to fix or mend
= synonyms: tinker
- play around with or alter or falsify, usually secretively or dishonestly
= synonyms: monkey
- manipulate manually or in one's mind or imagination
= synonyms: play
- play on a violin
= example: play on a violin
- play the violin or fiddle
- commit fraud and steal from one's employer
- avoid (one's assigned duties)
= synonyms: goldbrick
